sn46.44:1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn46.44:1.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, ‘duppañño eḷamūgo’ti vuccatī”ti?
sn46.44:1.4: “Sattannaṃ kho, bhikkhu, bojjhaṅgānaṃ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā ‘duppañño eḷamūgo’ti vuccati.
sn46.44:1.7: imesaṃ kho, bhikkhu, sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā ‘duppañño eḷamūgo’ti vuccatī”ti.
